Text.Value: Turning into a mind flayer.
You possess a prying heart. You crave insights and secrets that are not your own. You live through others, and neglect the self. We can help you rediscover you.
For the record, you have a false heart.
Spiders.
Do not be concerned with who I am. Instead consider what I can do for you.
The final question. How would you feel, if all your burdens were lifted?
Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in what is to come.

EditorData.NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

Text.Value: Loneliness.
For the record, you have a melancholy heart.
I would challenge them publicly, and humiliate them before all.
Perhaps you fear happiness. It is not as uncommon as you may think.
Curious. Perhaps you fear life without conflict. Perhaps you will invent some, for your own gratification.
Perhaps this was a mistake.
So be it. The second question. What is your unspoken desire?
Do I detect traces of the Underdark in your voice?
You are here because something grieves you. Perhaps you know what that is. Perhaps you merely think you know.
Wise. Healthy suspicion can prove to be the finest armour.

EditorData.stateContext: Hooded figure is standing before the player, who is still seated.

Text.Value: For the record, you have a prying heart.
I would kill them.
To run away from it all.
So simple? As you wish...
To be without power.
But let us spare the pretence. It seems you and I have more to speak of than your heart's struggles.
To indulge every hunger, every lust.
To dominate.
You possess a violent heart. Rage grips you. Blood inflames you. The House of Grief knows such burdens - and can lift such burdens.

EditorData.stateContext: Player is seated on a stone bench.

Text.Value: I would manifest new burdens within a tenday.
At Shar's altar.
Hush. You have already taken the first difficult step. Now you merely have to sit here a while and talk to me.
Truly? Perhaps you crave a dull life then.
What last caused you to shed a tear?
Who are you?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

Text.Value: You possess a jealous heart. Your wants are endless. All others are undeserving of any boon next to you. Envy is a fire that will consume you, but we can help douse it.
For the record, you have a violent heart.
Drop the act. You're not here to help - you're trying to dig around in my thoughts.
I spare them - but hunt down their beloved.
A wound.
Not all gods are worthy of gratitude.
You possess a melancholy heart. A smile is a stranger upon your lips. You do not know what you are missing, but you miss it nonetheless. We can spare you this pain.
You possess a false heart - deceiving as easily others breathe. You hide the truth even from yourself. But your true self is nothing to fear. We can show you this.
This is your own judgement of yourself. Embrace the truth your heart shares, however painful.

EditorData.stateContext: Player is seated on a stone bench. Viconia seated on the bench facing the opposite direct, intentionally avoiding eyecontact

Text.Value: And what if you did? It is not the timbre of my voice that matters; it is the wisdom it can impart to you.
Answer the questions I put to you. And answer honestly - the lips may try to deceive, but the heart will offer the truth, in the end. Let us begin.
Interesting accent.
All right. I want you to help me.
And this is the most effective way of helping. Besides, you are not above slipping into another's mind - I saw for myself.
To be held.
You! Boo would have caught your foul scent, had you not confounded his nose with evil Sharran incense.

EditorData.NodeContext: Low, indignant - not happy to see Viconia again.

Text.Value: You possess a craven heart. You flee when you should fight, seek to soften every hard choice. You are untempered. But we can help.
We will talk more down below.
The heartform grows clearer again. Such a burden you carry. But we can help.
For the record, you have a craven heart.
Truly? A soft heart is not always a virtue. You have sought our help just in time.
Immaterial. Please, as I said. We are here to help you.
Never happened.
I would be restless.
I would forgive them, but slowly poison them.
Do not look upon me.

EditorData.AnimationTags: A hooded figure appears and sits next to the player on the stone bench facing the opposite direction. The player starts to turn their head to look at the figure who rebukes them. The player looks forward again.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: A hooded figure appears in frame and sits next to the player on the stone bench facing the opposite direction. The player starts to turn their head to look at the figure, who rebukes them. The player looks forward again.

Text.Value: *She speaks your mother dialect - 'the best knife is the unseen one'. A curious sentiment for such a place.*
*The drow dialect. Something about a hidden knife. A curious sentiment for such a place.*
I would be happy.
I would be suspicious.
An onion.
Ah... lil alurl velve zhah lil velkyn uss...

EditorData.NodeContext: Approving. A drow saying, meaning 'the best knife is the unseen one' Pronounced 'Lill allurl veh-elv zah lill vel-kin us'

Text.Value: The fourth question. How would you spite one who wronged you?
To bathe in wealth and power.
This is your time, not mine. Look inward. See what will be discovered.
The second question. What is your unspoken desire?
You're wrong about me.
I would be lesser - my burdens moulded me.
I would fabricate a grave threat, and let them live in fear of it.
Our help comes at a price. One that cannot be discussed here. We will talk further, but first, an introduction.

EditorData.AnimationTags: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

Text.Value: You know the value of suffering - good. Life is full of it, whether you welcome it or not.
Disease.
Betrayal.
I would not. I would forgive them.
Grief.
*An unfamiliar presence caresses the deepest layers of your mind. You realise she's trying to detect your thoughts.*
She will find the path ahead where she always has.
It is done. Your heartform has revealed itself to me.
Your heartform begins to take shape. The third question. What is your greatest fear?
For the record, you have a jealous heart.
I would be grateful to the gods.
Viconia DeVir. Alas, I know you a little too well to follow you into a dark hole in the ground.

EditorData.NodeContext: Distaste at seeing an old acquaintance she was forced to travel with in the past.

Text.Value: Bring Shadowheart back here.
I am Viconia DeVir. The House of Grief is mine. But what lies beneath... that belongs to my mistress, and that is where you must go.

EditorData.AnimationTags: The player looked up at drow woman.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player looked up at drow woman. Ageless, elegant, silver-haired. Viconia DeVir.

Text.Value: The Mapping will reveal your heartform. Then the healing can begin.
A beautiful sunset.
Indeed? Reputations can be slower to heal than flesh...
Darkness.
To be dominated.
What happens now?

Synopsis: A disguised Viconia approaches the player and sits down beside them. They will ask questions to uncover the depths of their psyche. Before potentially inviting them to enter the Grotto.
